item.title: Report E-2025030073
item.description:
Report E-2025030073

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-16T21:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-03
  • City: CANTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On March 3, 2025, one (1) 5-gallon pail of UN2922 was punctured and released approximately one (1) gallon to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Green Site Services Group, Inc (GSSG) to remediate the site. The crew utilized absorbents and hand tools to remediate the site. The damaged pail was containerized in one (1) 30-gallon drum and all impacted materials were containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum for disposal.

item.title: Report X-2025030534
item.description:
Report X-2025030534

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-16T21:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-28
  • City: LYNNFIELD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED BY THE DRIVER ON ROAD. THE PACKAGE WAS RETURNED TO THE SORT CENTER. A DESIGNATED RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO REMOVE THE PACKAGE FROM THE PACKAGE CAR. THERE WAS N RESIDUAL SPILLAGE IN THE PACKAGE CAR SO NO FURTHER CLEANUP WAS NESESSARY. THE PACKAGE WAS TRANSPORTED TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. IT WAS THERE THE PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED TO BE AN UNDECLARED HAZMAT. ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBER: 1Z89853W0312615967
